1.name: E.M.P. Arrow
1.description: Hawkeye knocks the opponent back, then shoots them with an electromagnetic pulse.  Please taze me, Bro.

2.description: Hawkeye shows off by launching an explosive thermal-tipped arrow while upsidedown.

3.name: Explosive Barrage
3.description: He didn't miss. You might think he did, but he didn't.

signature.name: Hemorrhage
signature.description: Arrows strike the jugular to inflict severe Bleeding for a long duration.
